DOC.HEADLINE: INFLATION
DOC.TEXT: * Controlling inflation is in our best long-term interest . Inflation is an insidious , pernicious disease that erodes the financial foundation of a nation . The ills of inflation aren ' t readily apparent but that doesn ' t mean they are not destructive ( letters , Sept . 7 ) . Actual example : A retired couple sell their home_in 1976 for $ 20 # 000 to move to a mobile_home park . Three years later the buyer of their home resells it for $ 60 # 000 and the retired couple are having a tough time paying escalating ground_rent for their mobile_home . Meanwhile , investors dissatisfied with real_estate returns are turning_to the precious_metal markets for quicker profits . And the silliness hit the low point when supposedly prudent people started investing in pyramids ! Have we forgotten ? We ' re lucky to have the Volckers and Greenspans who haven ' t . ARTHUR DAWSON Hermosa Beach
